channel.title: "Whisper King Meta" Thread
channel.description:
**It’s been 2 weeks since a first post about the “Meta” comes out and of course there come out some solutions and ways who to fix this issue.** **I would like to make a little summary, the conclusions reached by users so far:**
1.Remove "Whisper" mechanic. 2.Weaken "Whisper" mechanic. 3.Buff some Unseen/Cult classes in order to get some use from King's whispers. 4.Make entirely new class, who is a counter to this particular Meta. 5.Changing odds of starting King alignment 6.Weaken or Remove abillity to whisper the King. And also not direcly but have connection to "Whisper" mechanic: 7.Weaken The Prince class.
In this page, i gonna put links to other posts, in order to organize for interested users. Edit: Anything from this thread don’t count as “my opinion”. Edit 2:Someone is wondering, why there is option #6,when it seems to be unrelated to topic. If devs decide to change something about King’s whispers, then the problem would end up being unsolved, because King’s Whispers will turn into Prince’s whispers. That’s why I decide to put this on list,

item.title: "Whisper King Meta" Thread
item.dc:creator: jabba
item.description:
Twil1ight:

3.Buff some Unseen/Cult classes in order to get some use from King’s whispers.

This is what I think is definitely the best solution. A big aspect of the Unseen’s playstyle, or at least its intended playstyle, is always having more information than the rest of the court. But right now, Unseen are actually pretty lacking in that department with how well BD are able to communicate with each other, between Prince, Psychic, whispers, and 80% BD king.
And this brings me to my next point, that the change from the “33/33/33 king setup” to the current one is definitely the root of the problem. But we can’t revert back to the old set up or anything near it because we’ll just return to

Livicus:

lynching King D2 again

To get a guaranteed BD king. And not to mention the recent wave of trigger-happy butlers that will poison D2 at 10 seconds just to “confirm myself… oops BD king is dead, RIP sorry guys.” (On a side note, the D3 limit for butler poison really needs to be brought back).

My suggestion is removing the MM’s ability to see class-types, and in its place give MM a Maid Spy-esque ability for two targets. This way people will be a lot more cautious with what information they confidently give away to king. If this is implemented however, then Aristocrat will need some other support/social ability to help unseen instead of his own Maid Spy, as it will be obsolete compared to his MM.

Twil1ight:
